Text: why can't someone seed instead of pissing around like this !!!
Great collection and very good quality. Plenty of seeders too! Worth the download.
I can't believe Ive waited this long to download Coldplay. I love em! Thanks for the upload.

Hardly any official Greatest hits, probably just some guys' collection of what he thinks are Coldplays greatest hits (like those Russian compilations, we all know). Some gems missing, few surprises but not a bad attempt of capturing this band. Middle of the road-collection, totally safe and no risks whatsoever. Not sure Chris Martin would agree with the choices, but still.
Thanx for uploading this album! It's not 320 kpbs but sounds formidable!
